items.sentence: I wonder whether Tom wants to go to Boston with us.
I thought you said you'd never go cycling with Tom.
I thought that Tom didn't know how to speak French.
I think Tom will be staying in Boston until Monday.
I don't think Tom has any friends who speak French.
You know you're not supposed to be here, don't you?
You know you aren't supposed to be here, don't you?
You know we have to do that before noon, don't you?
You know that you don't have to do this, don't you?
You know that I'd never let anything happen to you.
You do know you shouldn't be doing that, don't you?
You didn't know I needed to do that today, did you?
That's a good question. I'm glad that you asked it.
There's no doubt the new law won't be very popular.
There were many young children playing in the park.
How long does it usually take you to eat breakfast?
Tom will probably be late for today's meeting, too.
I don't want to do that, but I'll probably have to.
Tom would be disappointed if he saw you doing that.
You need to be careful not to get in anybody's way.
Tom promised he'd help us, but I don't believe him.
Tom started taking French lessons after he retired.
I don't know if there'll be someone waiting for me.
I now realize that I'd misunderstood what Tom said.
The ride with Tom was a terrible experience for me.
Tom has been seeing a counselor three times a week.
Tom said he knew something bad was going to happen.
Since it's raining, we can't paint the fence today.
Don't eat all the figs. Leave some for your sister.
Tom is standing on the table to change a lightbulb.
More people than expected showed up at the concert.
I wish someone would say something like that to me.
You smell like you haven't taken a bath in a month.
You should be able to walk again within a few days.
Even though Tom has a lot of money, he isn't happy.
Pretty soon, you'll realize that you need our help.
Mary and Alice were wearing the same color dresses.
I think that this is a step in the right direction.
Tom said that he didn't want to live anywhere else.
Keep the remote somewhere where Tom can't reach it.
The church is located in the center of the village.
Put some clothes on quickly or you'll catch a cold.
Tom is writing an article for the school newspaper.
If you do that, then everybody will probably leave.
How were you able to convince Tom to make you that?
The post office is not more than five minutes away.
I've never seen a strawberry as big as this before.
Do you have any idea what motivated Tom to do that?
I showed the painting that I was working on to Tom.
Please turn the lights off when you leave the room.
